name: Francisco Javier González-Barriga
title: Data Scientist and Software Engineer
aboutMeText: I am a passionate Data Scientist and Software Engineer with a strong background in computer science and data analysis. I enjoy solving complex problems and creating innovative solutions that make a difference.
hobbiesText: In my free time, I love exploring new technologies, reading books on various topics, and playing chess. I also enjoy hiking and spending time in nature.
interestsText: I am particularly interested in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and data visualization. I am always eager to learn new things and stay updated with the latest trends in technology.

footer.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
